articles.author: Darragh Fox
articles.title: Fabrizio Romano: Manchester United make "first verbal proposal" for Rasmus Højlund - Man United News And Transfer News | The Peoples Person - The Peoples Person
articles.description: Manchester United have tabled their first concrete offer to Atalanta for Rasmus Højlund. Amidst weeks of protracted negotiation, Fabrizio Romano has confirmed Old Trafford officials have made a “first verbal proposal” for the striker, worth in the region of €…
articles.content:
169Manchester United have tabled their first concrete offer to Atalanta for Rasmus Højlund.
